title: Happy Thoughts
content: Just wanted to remind you to smile today. Life's too short to be anything but happy!

title: Virtual Hug
content: Sending you a virtual hug! Remember, you're never alone.

title: Positive Vibes Only
content: Hey there! Sending you positive vibes for a fantastic day ahead. You've got this!

title: You're Awesome
content: You're amazing just the way you are. Keep shining bright!
